sourcesContent:
import { gql } from '@apollo/client'


export const ADD_BOOK = gql`
mutation addBook($title: String!, $published: Int!, $author: String!, $genres: [String!]!) {
  addBook(
    title: $title,
    published: $published,
    author: $author,
    genres: $genres
  ) {
    title
    published
    author
    id 
    genres
    }
  }

`
